name: Star Driller Ultra
description:
Drill through space and destroy your enemies to claim yourself as the king of the galaxy! Star Driller Ultra is a Star Fox-inspired space combat game where your play as a neon-colored drill to obliterate evil space ships.

Created for Ludum Dare 32 at Tech Valley Game Space; also funded by Patreon. Special thanks to the patrons below:

  • David Lin
  • Joshua Jennings
  • Tommy Pedersen
  • Jacob Clark
  • Adam R. Vierra
  • GerardoLegend

Note: while we're aware that Unity 5 can export to WebGL, our last attempt at creating one had some broken audio. The Unity webplayer also happens to have visual glitches as well, but is a far more enjoyable experience. We apologize for the inconvenience.
